line.comment: * triggered by SWM3.Ability.RebelCell.xml
*do nothing if New Republic is already dead
* create special Battlegroups for the New Republic but only once
* First spawn a Dreadnought leader.
* Then spawn 30 Dreadnoughts as followers.
* standart Rebel Cell Ability gets replaced by new special rules which setup the lategame megawar between New Republic and Empire
* Rebels quickly merge into New Republic
* first time sets a fixed decay rate which often wipes the faction out on the second time
* send a log message for each turned sector
* Break if we have turned enough sectors.
* on screen message
* Republic quickly merges into Empire
* first time sets a fixed decay rate which often wipes the faction out on the second time
* send a log message for each turned sector
* Break if we have turned enough sectors.
* on screen message
* ** start Megawar, also affects Mayhem.HasTotalWar.xml
* Make sure Empire is hostile to New Republic.
* Make sure there is no truce.
* * other way around, not sure if this is required.
* Make sure there is no truce.
* on screen message
* message

sval.val: do nothing if New Republic is already dead
create special Battlegroups for the New Republic but only once
standart Rebel Cell Ability gets replaced by new special rules which setup the lategame megawar between New Republic and Empire
Rebels quickly merge into New Republic
first time sets a fixed decay rate which often wipes the faction out on the second time
send a log message for each turned sector
Break if we have turned enough sectors.
first time sets a fixed decay rate which often wipes the faction out on the second time
send a log message for each turned sector
Break if we have turned enough sectors.
Make sure Empire is hostile to New Republic.
Make sure there is no truce.
* other way around, not sure if this is required.
Make sure there is no truce.
